ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: I can't see any animals from here!
I'm really hungry.
I'm parched.
This zoo needs some dessert carts!
I'm exhausted. I need a place to rest.
This zoo isn't amusing enough for me.
I need to find a bathroom soon.
I'm upset at the lack of trash cans.
Gross! I can't find a trash can that isn't overflowing!
Watching %s is very educational.
I'd prefer something other than a burger.
The burger tastes really good.
I really love to eat burgers.

I relish eating a good hot dog.

I really like eating the salad.

The shish kebab has lots of veggies.
I just love eating the shish kebab!

I really like the sub sandwich.

I love drinking the coffee.

I really like the water.

Cheesecake is my favorite dessert.

Cotton candy is one of my all-time favorites.

The fruit in the fruit cup is very fresh.
I love eating the fruit cup.
I'd prefer something other than ice cream.
The ice cream is great with sprinkles.
I scream for ice cream. I love it!

I like eating popcorn.

I like mustard on my pretzel.
I really like eating the pretzel.

I like eating at the restaurant.

Whew. That feels better.

I'm glad I had enough money in my account.
